arts.ttl: Relegation for Bochum, Mainz back in European spot
arts.sum: Mainz regain their European hopes with a comfortable win away at demoted Bochum.

arts.ttl: Bochum vs. Mainz 05 preview: Can the hosts avoid relegation?
arts.sum: Bochum will do their utmost to take their survival fight to the final day of the season when they play host to Mainz in Saturdayâ€™s Bundesliga contest.
